ValidationRule.description: Storage of Hazardous/Toxic Material â€“ when the value is NO, the field Materials stored in tanks should not be mandatory.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Setup.ExecutionControlSetting__c.Run_Validation_Rule__c && AND( RecordType.Name ='Amendment - FCC - Change of Location',ISPICKVAL( CLQ_Storage_of_Hazardous_Toxic_Material__c , 'Yes'), ISBLANK( CLQ_Materials_stored_in_Tanks__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide Materials stored in tanks.
